## To identify taste receptor cells
```{r}
genes_to_check = c('Krt8', 'Krt19', 'Tas1r1', 'Tas1r2', 'Tas1r3', 'P2rx7')
filename = make_filename(save_folder, 'allcells', 'cell_ontology_class', 'ridgeplot_taste-receptor')
RidgePlot(tiss, genes_to_check, group.by = 'cell_ontology_class', do.return=TRUE)
ggsave(filename, dpi=300)
dev.off()
write_caption("Key genes identifying taste receptor cells.", filename)
```
